# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.4 on Tue Dec  8 15:31:19 2020
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:LOGGING - [0:0]
-A FORWARD -d 192.168.27.3/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 25 -m state --state NEW -m recent --update --seconds 30 --hitcount 2 --name DEFAULT --mask 255.255.255.255 --rsource -j DROP
-A FORWARD -d 192.168.27.3/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 25 -m state --state NEW -m recent --set --name DEFAULT --mask 255.255.255.255 --rsource 
-A FORWARD -d 192.168.27.2/32 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -d 192.168.27.2/32 -j DROP
-A FORWARD -d 192.168.27.3/32 -j DROP
COMMIT
# Completed on Tue Dec  8 15:31:19 2020
